mapper.sql: SELECT REC_ID as "recId", EQUIP_KIND_CODE as "equipKindCode", EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", MEASURE_RANGE as "measureRange", MEASURE_ACCURACY as "measureAccuracy", VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", MEASURE_BARCODE as "measureBarcode", CERTIFICATE_NO as "certificateNo", CERTIFICATE_TYPE as "certificateType", VERIFY_RESULT as "verifyResult", VERIFY_PERIOD as "verifyPeriod", USE_BEGIN_DATE as "useBeginDate", LAST_VERIFY_DATE as "lastVerifyDate", NEXT_VERIFY_DATE as "nextVerifyDate", SEND_VERIFY_DATE as "sendVerifyDate", MANAGE_CLASS as "manageClass", VERIFY_PROOF as "verifyProof", VERIFY_CONCLUSION as "verifyConclusion", HANDLE_ORDER_NO as "handleOrderNo", MANAGE_MODE as "manageMode", CONTRACT_PRICE as "contractPrice", PERIOD_MODE as "periodMode", PLAN_STATUS as "planStatus", ALARM as "alarm", LINE_NO as "lineNo", LINE_SUB_NO as "lineSubNo", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", POSITION3 as "position3", POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", EQUIPMENT_STATE as "equipmentState", MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", MANUFACTURE_NO as "manufactureNo", MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", MANUFACTURE_CODE as "manufactureCode", COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", SOURCE as "source", CMD_FLG as "cmdFlg", CONFIRMATION as "confirmation", USE_NO as "useNo", USE_NAME as "useName", USE_DEPT_CODE as "useDeptCode", USE_DEPT_CNAME as "useDeptCname", COMPULSORY_TEST as "compulsoryTest", SEND_VERIFY_FLAG as "sendVerifyFlag", USE_PLACE as "usePlace", USE_AREA as "useArea", REMARK as "remark", WORK_FLOW_INST_ID as "workFlowInstId", WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS as "workFlowInstStatus", COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATOR_NAME as "recCreatorName", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISOR_NAME as "recRevisorName", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", REC_DELETOR_NAME as "recDeletorName", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", REC_STATUS as "recStatus", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT2 as "ext2", EXT3 as "ext3", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5", DOC_ID as "docId", PHONE_NO as "phoneNo", TRANSFER_DATE as "transferDate" , EXPIRATION_DATE as "expirationDate"
mapper.select:
FROM T_MEA_INSTRUMENT WHERE 1=1
and EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #{req.equipName} || '%'
and EQUIP_CODE like '%' || #{req.equipCode} || '%'
and MAT_SPECIFI like '%' || #{req.matSpecifi} || '%'
and USE_DEPT_CNAME like '%' || #{req.useDeptCname} || '%'
and USE_NAME like '%' || #{req.useName} || '%'
and LINE_NO=#{req.lineNo}
and MANUFACTURE_NO like '%' || #{req.manufactureNo} || '%'
and SEND_VERIFY_FLAG=#{req.sendVerifyFlag}
and USE_BEGIN_DATE>=#{req.useBeginBeginDate}
and #{req.useBeginEndDate}>=USE_BEGIN_DATE
order by REC_ID asc
mapper.insert:
insert ALL
INTO T_MEA_INSTRUMENT ( REC_ID, EQUIP_KIND_CODE, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, MEASURE_RANGE, MEASURE_ACCURACY, VERIFY_DEPT, MEASURE_BARCODE, CERTIFICATE_NO, CERTIFICATE_TYPE, VERIFY_RESULT, VERIFY_PERIOD, USE_BEGIN_DATE, LAST_VERIFY_DATE, NEXT_VERIFY_DATE, SEND_VERIFY_DATE, MANAGE_CLASS, VERIFY_PROOF, VERIFY_CONCLUSION, HANDLE_ORDER_NO, MANAGE_MODE, CONTRACT_PRICE, PERIOD_MODE, PLAN_STATUS, ALARM, LINE_NO, LINE_SUB_NO, POSITION1_CODE, POSITION1_NAME, POSITION2_CODE, POSITION2_NAME, POSITION3, POSITION_REMARK, EQUIPMENT_STATE, MAT_SPECIFI, MANUFACTURE_NO, MANUFACTURE, MANUFACTURE_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, SOURCE, CMD_FLG, CONFIRMATION, USE_NO, USE_NAME, USE_DEPT_CODE, USE_DEPT_CNAME, COMPULSORY_TEST, SEND_VERIFY_FLAG, USE_PLACE, USE_AREA, REMARK, WORK_FLOW_INST_ID, WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS, COMPANY_NAME, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATOR_NAME, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISOR_NAME, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETOR_NAME, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, DOC_ID, TRANSFER_DATE , PHONE_NO, EXPIRATION_DATE) VALUES ( #{mea.recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.equipKindCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.measureRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.measureAccuracy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.verifyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.measureBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.verifyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.verifyPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mea.useBeginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.lastVerifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.nextVerifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.sendVerifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.manageClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.verifyProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.verifyConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.handleOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.manageMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.contractPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mea.periodMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.planStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.alarm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mea.lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.lineSubNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.position1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.position1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.position2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.position2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.position3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.positionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.equipmentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.matSpecifi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.manufactureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.manufactureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.cmdFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.confirmation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.useNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.useName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.useDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.useDeptCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.compulsoryTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.sendVerifyFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.usePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.useArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.workFlowInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.workFlowInstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recCreatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recRevisorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recDeletorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.transferDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mea.expirationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select:
FROM T_MEA_INSTRUMENT WHERE 1=1
and EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #{equipName} || '%'
and EQUIP_CODE like '%' || #{equipCode} || '%'
and MAT_SPECIFI like '%' || #{matSpecifi} || '%'
and USE_DEPT_CNAME like '%' || #{useDeptCname} || '%'
and USE_NAME like '%' || #{useName} || '%'
and LINE_NO=#{lineNo}
and MANUFACTURE_NO like '%' || #{manufactureNo} || '%'
and SEND_VERIFY_FLAG=#{sendVerifyFlag}
and USE_BEGIN_DATE>=#{useBeginBeginDate}
and #{useBeginEndDate}>=USE_BEGIN_DATE
order by REC_ID asc
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MEA_INSTRUMENT SET EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode}, EQUIP_NAME=#{equipName}, VERIFY_DEPT=#{verifyDept}, MEASURE_BARCODE=#{measureBarcode}, CERTIFICATE_NO=#{certificateNo}, VERIFY_PERIOD=#{verifyPeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_VERIFY_DATE=#{lastVerifyDate}, NEXT_VERIFY_DATE=#{nextVerifyDate} WHERE EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode}
mapper.select: SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TEST_REC_ID as "testRecId", a.TEST_LIST_DETAIL_REC_ID as "testListDetailRecId", a.SEND_VERIFY_NO as "sendVerifyNo", b.CHECK_NO as "checkNo", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", a.MANUFACTURE_NO as "manufactureNo", a.MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", a.INSTALLATION_UNIT as "installationUnit", a.MEASURE_BARCODE as "measureBarcode", a.VERIFY_DATE as "verifyDate", a.VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", a.VERIFICATION_NO as "verificationNo", a.VERIFICATION_TYPE as "verificationType", a.VERIFY_PROOF as "verifyProof", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NO as "verifyReportNo", a.VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE as "verifyReportType", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NAME as "verifyReportName", a.VERIFY_REPORT_DATE as "verifyReportDate", a.VERIFY_FEE as "verifyFee", a.VERIFY_RESULT as "verifyResult", a.VERIFY_CONCLUSION as "verifyConclusion", a.VERIFY_REPORT_FILEID as "verifyReportFileid", a.LAST_VERIFY_DATE as "lastVerifyDate", a.NEXT_VERIFY_DATE as "nextVerifyDate", a.POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", a.POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", a.POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", a.POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", a.POSITION3 as "position3", a.POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", a.FAULT_NO as "faultNo", a.VERIFY_NOTE as "verifyNote", a.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", a.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5" FROM T_SUBMISSION_RECORD_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN T_MEA_SUBMISSION_RECORD b ON a.TEST_REC_ID=b.REC_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode} order by a.REC_CREATE_TIME desc
